perturbation.original_text: The Company operates an electronic retailing operation through its Internet sites located at www.cyberianoutpost.com or www.outpost.com (together with any successors to such sites, the "Company Site"). Through the Company Site, the Company sells or facilitates the sale of various products and services, either directly or as an agent for third party vendors. All products and services offered for sale through the Company Site are referred to as the "Products."
perturbation.changed_text: The Business operates an online sales platform through its Internet sites located at www.cyberianoutpost.com or www.outpost.com (together with any successors to such sites, the "Company Site"). Through the Company Site, the Business sells or facilitates the sale of various products and services, either directly or as an agent for third party vendors. All products and services offered for sale through the Company Site are referred to as the "Merchandise."
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Company' is changed to 'Business' and 'Products' to 'Merchandise,' creating confusion about whether these are interchangeable terms, especially concerning obligations tied to 'Products' later in the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: CNET will be responsible for incorporating the Online Promotions into the CNET Sites and for ensuring that the Online Promotions are accessible to users of the CNET Sites ("Users").
perturbation.changed_text: CNET will be responsible for incorporating the Online Promotions into the CNET Sites and for ensuring that the Online Promotions are accessible to patrons of the CNET Sites ("Customers").
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Users' is changed to 'Customers,' introducing ambiguity. Later sections refer to 'Users' and their actions, making it unclear if 'Customers' are the same and if the obligations apply to both or only 'Users'.

perturbation.original_text: The Company will be responsible for ensuring that each link embedded within an Online Promotion takes the User to the appropriate area within the Company Site, and that the Company Site functions with reasonable reliability and in a commercially reasonable manner throughout the Term.
perturbation.changed_text: The Business will be responsible for ensuring that each link embedded within an Online Promotion takes the Visitor to the appropriate area within the Company Site, and that the Company Site functions with reasonable reliability and in a commercially reasonable manner throughout the Term.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Company' to 'Business' (as in the first change) and 'User' to 'Visitor' further muddies the waters. The text mixes 'Business' and 'Company' and introduces 'Visitor' without clarity, leading to confusion about responsibilities and who the links should target.
